titles.title: Safe Water for Military Families Act
To direct the Secretary of Defense to prohibit the use of firefighting foam containing perfuoroalkyl or polyfluoroalkyl substances, and for other purposes.
Safe Water for Military Families Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Safe Water for Military Families Act
This bill requires the Department of Defense (DOD) to ensure that, no later than January 1, 2029, it uses only non-fluorinated firefighting foam, which does not contain a perfluoroalkyl or polyfluoroalkyl substance (PFAS) with at least one fully fluorinated carbon atom.
DOD shall study best practices to clean up ground contaminated by PFAS substances.
